Subject: Confidential files
Description:
Hi,
in the "Endpoint Protector 5.9.3.0 User Manual" in section 6 "Content Aware Protection" (page 75) I read about the possibility to apply policies on the file content. 
Specifically, I wanted to ask what is meant by "Confidential files" and how do I define them.

PS: I have the server version 5.9.4.0

Thanks in advance!

Giulia Cavalleretto
Solution_Comment__c: Closing as resolved after having the customer use valid IBAN codes that would trigger the predefined content.
